column1: The putative di - leucine ( L - L - X - X) motif at the C - terminus, which may act as a late endosomal / lysosomal targeting signal, is also conserved [ 9].

Amplification was performed in a 25 - mu l volume containing 15 mM Tris - HCl ( pH 8. 3), 50 mM KCl, 2. 5 mM MgCl2, 0. 2 mM dNTP, 0. 2 mu M of each primer, and 1. 25 U of AmpliTaq Gold ( Applied Biosystems, Foster City, California, United States).
